author: {'steamid': '76561198208264569', 'num_games_owned': 232, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 20, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 20, 'last_played': 1673610529}
review: Soy un padre de 50 años, probablemente una de las personas más viejas que juegan este juego. Soy padre soltero de mi hijo, que ahora tiene 14 años. Mi hijo recientemente descargó Raft y en menos de una semana, ya había jugado durante más de 20 horas. Esto fue terrible para mí, ya que ya era bastante difícil para mí pasar tiempo con mi hijo, ya que él siempre sale con sus amigos o simplemente mira videos en Tiktok. Así que decidí crear una cuenta de Steam y comprar este juego para ver si podía jugar junto a él. Cargué el juego, hice el tutorial pero estaba atascado en lo que se suponía que debías hacer. Le pedí ayuda a mi hijo y organizó un juego para que yo me uniera. Me encantó porque era el mejor momento que había pasado con mi hijo desde que mi esposa había muerto. Desde entonces, este juego ha acercado a mi hijo y a mí nuevamente y ahora también pasamos tiempo juntos fuera de la casa. Este juego me recordó que hay diversión en todo, y nos ha traído tanto a mí como a mi hijo muchos recuerdos felices.

review:
《泰坦之魂》本以为是肉鸽游戏，却是精神受虐者狂喜作品，不能只有我一人受虐，非常推荐家人们!
新年第一天，摸到这游戏 ，一杯奶茶，一个手柄摸一天。没有升级没有道具没有教程。全程就一个弓箭一个闪避一条命，弓箭没自瞄辅助，补刀还得快，机会稍纵即逝。老实说，我新手关卡打了一天，已经是被气到极度清醒了。

author: {'steamid': '76561197979982910', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 44, 'playtime_forever': 67, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 12, 'last_played': 1675317207}
review: This game needs far better movement controls to not drive you insane, given the brilliant run-all-the-way-back-to-the-boss mechanic. Dying because you move like a geriatric slug who has also decided he probably didn't need to learn how to dodge roll & is stuck with the skills of a 3rd grader somersaulting at recess. Pretty frustrating when put on top of having to stand still and wait to use the weakest force-recall of an object that exists in the history of video games. There are some good ideas in here, but they fumbled the core mechanics.

author: {'steamid': '76561197975386741', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 225, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 225, 'last_played': 1675123586}

review:

Please give me some points. I want to buy a background, but I have no money. Although it won't make your cow grow longer, there will be one more person in the world wishing you well.

ポイントをください。背景を買いたいですが、お金がありません。あなたの牛を長くすることはありませんが、世界にはもう一人の人があなたを祝福しています

Hãy cho tôi điểm, tôi muốn mua một nền tảng, nhưng không có tiền, mặc dù sẽ không làm cho con bò của bạn dài ra, nhưng sẽ có nhiều người trên thế giới này chúc phúc cho bạn

author: {'steamid': '76561198984448848', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 462, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 442, 'last_played': 1708794973}
review:

author: {'steamid': '76561197974795592', 'num_games_owned': 467, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 38, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 28, 'last_played': 1674947781}
review:
(Mi segna 0.5 ore, non so perché…)

Ottimo gioco! Non sono d’accordo con chi lo accosta a Dark Souls. È molto più simile ad uno Shadow of the Colossus: vaghi un una terra desolata, completamente vuota, in cerca delle anime dei Titani, che abbatti anche se non ti hanno fatto nulla di male…

Ogni boss ha una meccanica unica, sempre ben pensata. In ogni combattimento devi studiare l’avversario, morendo varie volte, fino a al momento in cui capisci il suo punto debole, e la volta in cui riesci a sferrare la freccia nel modo giusto, il combattimento si conclude in pochi secondi. Boss secondo me molto belli, il contrario di quelli di alcuni giochi che sono solo sacchetti di punti vita.

author: {'steamid': '76561198339835321', 'num_games_owned': 138, 'num_reviews': 73, 'playtime_forever': 609, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 605, 'last_played': 1695709396}
review:
적이라곤 체력 1인 보스만 존재하는 도트 액션게임입니다.

조그만한 캐릭터로 조그만한 활로 조그만한 보스의 히트박스를 노려 쏘면되는 간단한 게임인데
한발 한발 쏠 때 마다 스릴있어서 적을 처치하는데 성공한다면 그만큼 쾌감도 지립니다

대신, 방향키 조작으론 다양한 방향으로 쏘는게 불가능해서 
각도가 애매해 피격판정을 절묘하게 빗나가는 경우가 심심찮게 보여요
물론 클리어에 지장은 없습니다만, 고통받는 시간이 늘어날뿐 패드사용이 적극 권장됩니다.

보스의 패턴을 잘 보고 파악하다보면 2~3시간만에 엔딩까지 도달가능하니
잠시나마 시간때우기 좋은 게임입니다

모든 도전과제를 달성하기 굉장히 어려워서 하드모드 클리어까지만 맛보고 삭제하시는게 정신건강에 도움될 듯 합니다..
전 한 목숨으로 하드모드, 모든 보스처치는 도저히 못하겠어요..

author: {'steamid': '76561198011949271', 'num_games_owned': 983, 'num_reviews': 87, 'playtime_forever': 68, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 68, 'last_played': 1674467999}
review: There is an infamous Playstation-exclusive developer by the name of Gilson B Pontes. Every one of his games features the same gameplay loop: you walk around a vast, empty world, until you encounter an enemy which kills you in one hit. The developers of Titan Souls looked at Gilson's work and pondered just what it was that made it so unappealing. Was it the hostile design that delights in wasting the player's time? Was it the lack of things to do in the environment? Was it the barebones, clunky combat mechanics? No! They concluded that the only thing holding Gilson's work back was an ugly aesthetic, which they have replaced with more visually appealing pixel art. Oh, and also you can enjoy firing a single arrow before getting killed in one hit and spending three minutes walking back to the enemy, as opposed to swinging a sword before getting killed in one hit and spending five minutes walking back to the enemy. This is peak innovation.

author: {'steamid': '76561198305674799', 'num_games_owned': 59, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 549, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 432, 'last_played': 1710901520}
review:
Titan Souls. Um jogo excelente e divertido. Minha nota para ele é um 8/10. Este jogo é uma curta e ótima experiência, mas não sendo muito desafiador, funcionando quase como um Boss Rush.

Ele gira em torno de uma mecânica onde você possuiu uma única flecha, que depois de atirar ela você pode recuperar a puxando de volta ou passando por cima dela, e ao decorrer do jogo você não ganha nenhum upgrade ou habilidade nova, não tendo nenhuma recompensa quando você mata um chefe, que na minha opinião é bem decepcionante, mas nada que estraga o jogo. Ele possui uma boa quantidade de chefes, cada um tendo uma funcionalidade bem única o que deixa o jogo mais interessante no fim, tendo um ótimo visual e trilha sonora. 

Titan Souls no final de tudo é um jogo que eu recomendo bastante, porém acredito que é melhor pegar ele quando estiver em uma boa promoção, assim como eu fiz.

author: {'steamid': '76561198134987985', 'num_games_owned': 215, 'num_reviews': 92, 'playtime_forever': 90, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 90, 'last_played': 1674263204}
review:
Cool concept, awful execution

The biggest annoyance is that it tries to do the same thing as dark souls by forcing you to run back to the boss room from a checkpoint, but there's no point in it. There are no enemies or tricky platforming or whatever, just nothing. Imagine trying to get better at throwing hoops, but everytime you miss, you have to sit on a bench for 2 minutes before you can try again. It doesn't make you any better at it.

Some bosses are also poorly designed since they either require you to shoot at them twice while they regain their immunity in less than the time it takes for you to retrieve your arrow (yes I tried damaging them by pulling my arrow back, it didn't work and made a clinking sound as if you're hitting a rock or a piece of metal) or have hitboxes that don't correspond to their visuals.

At least the art style is pretty cool and the music and atmosphere is nice, but that's just about everything positive about this game.

It's just a massive slog

author: {'steamid': '76561199156337224', 'num_games_owned': 66, 'num_reviews': 56, 'playtime_forever': 317, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 235, 'last_played': 1698505905}
review:
Si tuviese que describir este juego en una sola palabra, sería minimalismo. Es increíble como en 3-4 horas y UN punto principal, consigue divertir y variar tanto.

Básicamente va de una persona cualquiera que se encuentra en un vasto mundo lleno de titanes, criaturas mucho más imponentes y aparentemente poderosas que él. Al más puro estilo Shadow of the Collosus, iremos derrotando a distintos titanes con nuestra única arma, el arco. El combate es el focus del juego.  Este es fluídisimo, es súper gratificante simplemente combatir, aunque te mueras. El movimiento está súper bien hecho y el arco se maneja muy bien.

Los bosses, lo principal... Son perfectos. Simplemente eso. Los combates tienen 2 fases: la primera, encontrar el punto débil y la segunda a darle al punto débil. Eso hace que los primeros intentos de un jefe, él se sienta desconocido, ya que no sabes qué hay que hacer realmente. Consiguen que de una flecha salgan varias mecánicas bastante originales y divertidas.

Visualmente, es muy bonito, con entornos variados y un pixel art simple pero muy bonico. La música es como yo lo llamo "hacer un Breath of The Wild". Esto es no poner música en el overworld y en los combates poner para que sean más épicos, y lo hace muy bien. Transmite muy bien esa sensación de soledad ante un mundo tan grande.

Titan Souls me ha parecido un juegardo en toda regla que todo el mundo debería jugar aunque fuera solo una vez.

author: {'steamid': '76561198218485847', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 416, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 416, 'last_played': 1673697875}
review:
Short, simple action roguelite game with a cryptic barebones story. Pretty good pixelart with large expansive world, which is quite underutilized. It almost felt like the map is padding out the actual gameplay a bit too much. Armed with a bow and a single arrow that can be recalled back to you, you face off against the titular titans. Every titan has a unique approach to killing them. Figuring out each titan's weakness and the optimal strategy requires multiple tries. Unfortunately, there's no instant restart mechanism for the battles. Note that some of the titans are optional, including some hidden behind some simple puzzles.

Recommended if you can be patient enough with the game (I died around 200 times for 1 playthrough).

Redeemed the game for free as a limited-time promo when the developers released Death's Door, which is a sequel to this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198211108747', 'num_games_owned': 155, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 492, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 467, 'last_played': 1687491338}
review: Juegazo

author: {'steamid': '76561197983145909', 'num_games_owned': 115, 'num_reviews': 111, 'playtime_forever': 216, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 216, 'last_played': 1673713244}
review:
Game focuses on screen shaking and clunky movement mechanics to pose a challenge.
My eyes get really tierd with the constant shaking, while also having to keep track of everything. Basically increasing the difficulty by putting a hand infront of your face. Feels cheap.

Games where movement is an important aspect dose not benefit from dodge while aproaching a wall or stairs to knock you back. Making you lose control of your character. One of the earlier bosses uses a pushback effect while a pike is chasing you which knocks you back if it hits and stuns you for a breif moment if you are knocked into a wall dead, if you are hit by projectile you are also dead. Movement is important, but dose feel cluncky. All this while of course there is screen shaking and particle effects.

One redeming factor to this game is that most encounters requires you to do what is right just once to kill the boss. Avoiding the concept of bulletsponge type of bosses.

author: {'steamid': '76561197980097304', 'num_games_owned': 904, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 170, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 170, 'last_played': 1673688460}
review:
とりあえず全ボスノーマルクリアまでプレイ。

スチームのレビューはgoodかbadしかないのでその二つで言えばbadを付けざる得ない。
このゲームの主軸であるボスとの1ライフ勝負はとても良く出来ていて、戦闘中の緊張感や倒した時の達成感はなかなかのも。
唯一戦闘関連で直してほしいのはダッシュと回避を分けて欲しいってところくらい(とはいえ結構致命的なデザインミスだと思う)。

しかしそれ以外の部分がこのゲームの良いところを全部潰す形になっているのがとても残念。

まず何十回も死ぬことを前提としたデザインなのに、ボスとの再戦まで毎度面倒な道を歩かされる。
ボスと戦っている時間より歩いてる時間の方が長いなんてのがざらにあり、肝心のボス戦が億劫になるレベル。

そしておそらくはこの世界観を見て欲しいのだろうと思われる無駄に広い道中。
確かに世界観の作りこみは感じるが、広すぎるし別に道中にモブが居るわけでも収集物があるわけでもないので、退屈に感じる程ただ歩くだけのフィールドを作る理由が分からなかった。

とにかく核となるボス戦以外の余計な部分でストレスを感じる場面が多く、プレイヤーにゲームをプレイさせるという事に関しての作りこみの甘さを感じる。

最近割と多い面白いけどダメなゲームの典型的な例だと個人的には感じる。

author: {'steamid': '76561198893554952', 'num_games_owned': 843, 'num_reviews': 223, 'playtime_forever': 227, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 227, 'last_played': 1673497326}
review:
只有boss且敌我都是一击毙命的俯视角动作游戏，让人想到旺达与巨像，都是boss战，插核心，吸灵魂？
不过泰坦之魂没有那样史诗级恢宏的场面和战斗，基本摸清套路后都是三五招内结束战斗。主要玩的就是找弱点和套路，无非也就是直接插弱点、攻击使泰坦暴露弱点再插弱点和诱导泰坦攻击自己暴露弱点再插弱点。操作感不错，场景和音乐是真的棒，只打完看门四个泰坦在遗迹里逛逛也是挺舒服的。
倒数第二个boss自己的灵魂倒影设计的真烂，没有能让本体和灵魂长时间分离的办法，只能抓闪避时机插本体，触发战斗灵魂攻击两次必闪避，这时提前蓄力插本体就行。这种比较关键的boss设计的一点意思都没有，让人很失望。

author: {'steamid': '76561199041918108', 'num_games_owned': 43, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 151, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 146, 'last_played': 1680226559}
review: да

author: {'steamid': '76561198338615930', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 2528, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1290, 'last_played': 1697572818}
review:
Difícil, desafiador e nada recompensador. Frustante é uma das palavras que da pra definir esse jogo, sua simplicidade na gameplay não impede de inovar em cada boss battle que em resumo se basei em tentativa e erro, cabendo ao jogador ter a força de vontade e paciência (muita inclusive) pra avançar no jogo. Tenho certo ranço dos controles que não são muito precisos pra esse tipo de jogo.

 O jogo é extremamente bonito e charmoso ao seu modo, o mapa bonito e contemplativo ajuda a embelezar a experiência e passar a vibe do game. A OST é muito boa e pra min brilha bem mais nos momentos de interlúdio da ida de um lugar para o outro. A história é contada pelos lugares e cenários, poucos são os personagens que tem dialogo, tornando tudo extremamente interpretativa, oque eu pessoalmente gosto.

 Por fim, recomendo pra quem curte jogos difíceis e que exigem muito do jogador (perfect time, bons reflexos e paciência). Bom jogo.

7,5/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198025321433', 'num_games_owned': 1160, 'num_reviews': 452, 'playtime_forever': 37, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 37, 'last_played': 1673417823}
review:
A game on the wrong side of hard. Armed with one move - shooting an arrow - you set out to take down a myriad of bosses. No story, barely any music and somewhat pretty pixel art give you guidance.

I fought about 8 bosses or so, and that was all I needed to see. The interesting part is that most bosses can be killed very quickly with some good aim as they only need one or two shots to die. I find it very intriguing to have bosses that are just as weak and fragile as the player, but the execution leaves a bit to be desired. The problem starts with the bosses that take more than one shot or have a weak point that is very weird or awkward to hit. One example is the water snake boss, which has a weak point at its tail. I could swear I hit that point dozens of times and eventually it registered, but it's very finnicky. Other bosses require you to either read the developers minds or almost feel like you have to abuse the shoot mechanic to hit their weak point.

The game also lacks some severe impact. The sound effects are flat, and while taking down a boss by shooting a precise spot can be fulfilling, it is absolutely not reflected in the presentation. Shooting the bow just feels weak and everything seems floaty.

The gimmick of only bosses becomes old very quick, though, and if you are not an elite pro gamer or have impeccable aim (of firing an arrow with a very narrow hitbox while having to dodge), the game will quickly become frustrating. Even aside from that, though, I think the pixel art is a bit flat and doesn't have enough depth to keep the game interesting to look at and the music is either nonexistent or barely there. Sadly, this all accumulates in a severe lack of atmosphere and after killing 8 or so bosses, I had enough. Worth a look if the concept sounds interesting to you, but DEFINITELY not for full price and only if you have a lot of patience, though personally I will not recommend it. Then again, I suck!

review: The game feels empty. It looks great if you like pixel art but it just dumps you in and you fight bosses. You get one hit. That't it. You are little Mario with no mushroom in sight the entire beginning. It doesn't feel rewarding to beat a boss. There isn't any customization. For 2 dollars, the game would be great. for 15, it is far too overpriced for me to recommend in good conscience. Any of the souls games or their spin-offs are just as difficult but far more enjoyable and rewarding.

review: Mark Foster, David Fenn, and Andrew Gleeson, what happened to you all to create such an unforgiving masterpiece? Why would you release this punishing iron maiden of gaming into the world? Anyway, I'm off to play Death's Door now.

review: PELO A MOR DE DEUS NÃO COMPREM ESSE JOGO; olha, 4 reais da pra comprar fallout new vegas entao nao se contentem a comprar essa caca, eu gosto de jogos dificeis,hades, celeste,hollow knight,dark souls todos são jogos bons, porém hollow knight é tipo: ok morri pra o boss aprendi bastante e tal tal tal, titan souls é tipo: ok entrei na sala do boss, acordei ele, pisquei o olho e puts agora estou morto, voce toma instakill pra tudo, tu precisa carregar o arco pra ele andar mais de um centimetro e nao da pra carregar pq os boss anda a 1000km por hora e tu tbm toma INSTAKIL!!!! ao ponto de tu literal morrer em menos de 3 segundos ao entrar na sala do boss. então tira isso da lista de desejos e guarda seus 4 reais. mão vale a pena nem um centavo, vou reembolsar isso e nunca mais comprar anaoser que me deem um cheque de tres gazilhões de reais. o jogo só não é divertido, entrar numa sala, tomar instakill pq deu o dash 1 segundo dps do que o normal, agora espera a cutscene do personagem deitado se levantando por 5seg e depois anda até o boss que é mais uns 15seg, agora repete isso 80x e depois disso voce matar um dos bosses. esse é o jogo

author: {'steamid': '76561198845256117', 'num_games_owned': 134, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 1366, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1356, 'last_played': 1672739971}
review:
终于全成就了
游戏一周目玩起来可能有些高血压，我过一周目都死了600多次。过完一周目接着打二周目、三周目，后面尝试困难、一命、无滚。慢慢熟悉每个boss打法之后分分钟秒杀才是最爽的。每个boss都打熟悉了再开一命，虽然过程可能有些高血压，但是慢慢减少失误，自最后一命通关是真的爽。
另外一提键盘操作可能需要一段时间上手，看评论都在吐槽键盘操作。我是全程键盘操作，感觉熟悉以后操作起来还是比较顺滑，特别是熟悉boss套路之后，感觉键盘手柄操作大差不差。

author: {'steamid': '76561199075773060', 'num_games_owned': 50, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 423, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 273, 'last_played': 1702661351}
review:
Titan Souls é um ótimo desafio pra quem é persistente.
O jogo possui uma pixel art linda com alguns bosses tendo um 3d maneiro, além da soundtrack extremamente boa.
Em relação da gameplay, cada boss tem seu jeito de ser derrotado e o fato de você só ter uma flecha complica ainda mais derrotar eles. Provavelmente você vai ter dor de cabeça com alguns chefões.
A história é solta durante todo o jogo, não é a história mais interessante que eu já vi, mas é boa.
Um ponto negativo no jogo na minha opinião é não poder configurar os controles, queria jogar no WASD mas tive que me contentar com as setas.
Bom, se você for jogar, se prepare pra muito rage.

author: {'steamid': '76561198022182848', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 353, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 273, 'last_played': 1672395193}
review:
One hit KO for you and the boss. The entire game is just a small fantasy map with no enemies, and some souls-like save points spread out, each save point near a number of boss doors. You have a bow and single arrow that you can recall after shooting, which leaves you vulnerable. You can roll, and run. It's a lot like shadow of the colossus, simplified and with a souls-like save point system. Some bosses are frustrating to figure out wtf to do to kill it, but the majority are not too difficult. You will die, a lot, but save points are close to boss doors. I'm fighting the last boss right now (giving the game a break for the night), and I'm over 100 deaths. The only fault of this game is that you might figure out the correct solution to killing a boss, but miss slightly with your arrow many times, and then you might start trying another tactic because you think your strategy was wrong, when in fact it was the right strategy all along (you were just not hitting the spot exactly where the hit box was). This happened twice to me, so if you think you know the correct solution, stick with your gut. Overall, I give this game 8/10. It's a good and relatively difficult boss killing game.

Edit: Just beat the game, all bosses, 258 total deaths xD

author: {'steamid': '76561199009795133', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 372, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 364, 'last_played': 1676219470}
review:
A ver, a día de hoy titan souls es y sigue siendo ese tipo de juegos que definitivamente son un reto, donde lo divertido es pensar en como resolverlos, hablando específicamente de que trata de combates contra titanes.

Incluso diría que es un referente, porque al menos yo, me refiero a este tipo de juegos, como los tipo "Titan Souls" 

En conclusion, LO RECOMIENDO, encarecidamente incluso a día a hoy. Ya que por su jugabilidad, simpleza que aqui significa todo lo entretenido del gameplay, Música, arte e incluso historia. 

Titan souls es definitivamente un juego, que si te gustan los retos, al 100% deberías jugar, ya que este es todo un referente.

\[T]/ ☀️

author: {'steamid': '76561198023361739', 'num_games_owned': 163, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 169, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 132, 'last_played': 1678934488}
review:
It was a bit shorter than I was expecting. Sure, there's some replayability with harder new game+ modes, but that doesn't interest me so much.

The gameplay was also much more abrupt than I was expecting. With comparisons to Dark Souls I was expecting chipping away at their health, but you die in one hit and so do the bosses (in most cases). So there are some times where you start a boss fight and it only lasts about 5 seconds.

author: {'steamid': '76561198439624029', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 194, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 68, 'last_played': 1684946466}
review: Comecei agora, já tiltei infinitas vezes, faz apenas 68 minutos, esse jogo doí, ele te faz perder a esperança de inumeradas formas, e quando você esta prestes a desistir você finalmente consegue. Resumindo ele é que nem aquelas cenas de criança, quando você ta correndo com uma casquinha de sorvete e você finalmente vai comer o seu sorvete e o seu suculento sorvete inesperadamente cai, que é quando você morre inúmeras vezes se sentindo um lixo, quase sentindo o gosto da vitória! Mas quando você ganha e como se finalmente o seu sorvete não caísse e assim você pode comer em paz. Se você não liga de passar raiva recomendo muito esse jogo, pois quando você vence é gratificante.

author: {'steamid': '76561198363680967', 'num_games_owned': 54, 'num_reviews': 45, 'playtime_forever': 1252, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 378, 'last_played': 1710821391}
review:
I like hard bosses, and this had them.
Interesting mechanic, however:
You 1-shot every phase of every boss.* Your bow also can be dragged in, and some of the achievements even have you use this mechanic, sometimes even for a achievement. Overall, it's a somewhat hard boss rush game with nearly nothing else. I liked it, and the bosses were so cool and memorable. But it's only that.

*Sometimes to hit the bosses core you have to break the boss apart, shoot a tooth, etc...

review: Very simple graphics and good music. Easy to know what to do. But it is very hard game that has much challenge! You die on one hit so you need be very carefull on what you do. Many bosses are very very hard and sometimes you only beat them on luck. It is not relaxing game but very good for trying your skill and feels good to win hard bosses. It is fun to try figure out what works to kill boss.

author: {'steamid': '76561199038256146', 'num_games_owned': 96, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 231, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 231, 'last_played': 1671569483}
review:
Corto , pero difícil. Titan Souls es un juego del estilo "Boss rush" muy simple pero muy bien ejecutado con rasgos muy similares al gran Shadow of the Colossus. Tan simple que tenemos dos únicas acciones , lanzar/recoger nuestra flecha y esquivar. Con solo estas dos simples acciones , Acid Nerve consiguió crear un ambiente de juego más desafíante de lo que puede parecer en un principio. 

La mecánica principal del juego es que cada boss que nos vamos a encontrar posee un punto débil , y nos bastará con un único flechazo para acabar con él. 

Puede parecer sencillo dicho de esta forma , pero los 20 bosses que dispone Titan Souls tienen diseños originales y se nos va a hacer difícil saber realmente como acabar con ellos.

Todo esto acompañado de un pixel art bastante simpatico y una música muy notable. 

Muy recomendable para las casi 4 horitas que me ha durado.

author: {'steamid': '76561198453458680', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 6, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6, 'last_played': 1652688013}

author: {'steamid': '76561198057087486', 'num_games_owned': 651, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 1056, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1055, 'last_played': 1704931445}
review: Provavelmente as 18 horas mais estressantes e recompensadoras que dediquei a um único jogo. O que começou com uma jogatina de mais de 4 horas para chegar ao boss final, termina com um save de menos de 30 minutos e a borda dourada, e outro de menos de 20 para a conquista que me fez apreciar ainda mais o talento dos speedrunners de qualquer jogo que seja. Simplesmente fantástico, se estiver na promoção é compra obrigatória para jogadores que gostam de boss rush e aceitam um desafio.

author: {'steamid': '76561198022534688', 'num_games_owned': 1138, 'num_reviews': 113, 'playtime_forever': 96, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 96, 'last_played': 1671135687}
review: Metric-ton-of-crap: The Game! ANY game that doesn't allow you to customize your KB+M keybinds (and "strongly recommends a gamepad"), while requiring precise movement due to how difficult it is, cannot be good no matter how much you white-knight it for whatever reason. If you require skill from the player, at least let him customize his controls so he can comfortably give his 100% without the necessity to conform with playing on exclusively KB+M OR gamepad, just because "that is how the game is designed". I cannot, for the love of me, play this game on gamepad, and since KB+M custom keybinds are absent I am literally unable to finish this game (and to those "git gud on gamepad" clowns, I say - get a life, touch some grass! Just because you are skilled with a gamepad does not mean that I - or anyone who grew-out of gamepad phase since KB+M is vastly supperior - should tryhard to master using it so I could beat a game.)

author: {'steamid': '76561198439526483', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 894, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 369, 'last_played': 1701061215}
review:
很棒的游戏，具有[b]挑战性[/b]。
充满诗意的风格与音乐，boss的bgm更是很有神话冒险的[b]史诗感[/b]。
每个boss都各具特色，寻找弱点一击毙命的设计很独特也很有小解密的感觉，死亡无数次最后自己找到方法打败boss之后会很[b]有成就感[/b]的（魂的内涵吧可能是）。还有steam的成就非常适合想要去更彻底的挑战这个游戏的玩家。

不过需要注意就是[b]对键鼠玩家是不友好的[/b]，可以说这游戏完全不能用键鼠玩，方向上会变得如同是以撒似的只有四个射箭的攻击方向，会很难受。（我是后来换了手柄才发现的，当时用键盘玩还想吐槽这游戏设计怎么会这么脑淤血.）

author: {'steamid': '76561198725171733', 'num_games_owned': 447, 'num_reviews': 54, 'playtime_forever': 263, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 235, 'last_played': 1671123998}
review:
buen juego, un juego donde tendrás que pegar una sola flecha en el lugar indicado, y en el momento adecuado para matar a los enemigos, solo hay jefes, ya que el juego no es que tenga 1000 flechas, solo una y que la podes volver a usar, únicamente si es atraída por nuestra fuerza tipo Star Wars, o pasando por encima, tendrás que analizar como matar a algunos jefes, pero todos tienen la debilidad marcado con un color aparte, solo tenes que analizar, podes terminar el juego sin matar a todos los jefes, aunque en algunos casos no los encontré, pero nada que Google no tenga, en fin, es un juego simple pero bueno.

Comprenlo si es que quieren jugar algo fácil y difícil a la vez, aunque debo decir, que aunque es un juego tipo "soul", no tiene esa satisfacción por matar a un jefe.

review: Fun, then frustrating, then eventually satisfying, as with most games of its type. There's no energy wasted in this game--it's mainly just a sequence of bosses, with the odd puzzle. Very pleasant world to be in when you're not trying to kill massive lumps of rock with a puny bow and arrow.

author: {'steamid': '76561198188664927', 'num_games_owned': 1605, 'num_reviews': 386, 'playtime_forever': 139, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 139, 'last_played': 1670207450}
review:
[quote]Follow my Curator page, [url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/41363546-Fruit-N-Doggie-Reviews/]Fruit N Doggie Reviews,[/url] so you can be updated whenever I post a new review.[/quote]
[h1]Overall Rating - Seriously Flawed ★★☆☆☆[/h1]

[h1]First Impressions[/h1] 
At one point, it seemed like Titan Souls (TS) was this exciting, up and coming game. You'd go up against epic bosses and uncover secrets about this interesting world. Sometime after it launched, the interest seemed to fade fast. A flash in the pan experience. Regardless, I can't believe it released seven years ago, back in 2015. Either way, it's time to see if these titans have soul. 


[h1]Gameplay[/h1] 
TS has a rather simple concept. Each boss dies from one shot of your arrow. What you have to figure out is how to survive their own attacks so you can set up that death strike. There's no peons, RPG elements, shops, or other distractions. It's very streamlined and to the point. I wouldn't say any of the fights are a puzzle per se, but some require a bit of thinking or clever interaction in order to create that opening. For instance, using your ability to call your arrow to you in order to strike them from behind. 

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2897602164
[h1]Controls[/h1] 
Although the developers recommend playing TS with a controller, I saw some comments on how they beat it just fine with a keyboard. For me, moving and aiming in tandem with each other would be too much for me to manage that way, so I relied on my controller. One thing I wasn't fond of was not being able to run without rolling first. It seems like that would have been possible to account for with unused buttons on the controller. 


[h1]Story[/h1] 
Honestly, TS gives me the impression of a game the developers hoped would come across as really mysterious and clever, without earning it. Putting a player into an unexplained situation with sparse bread crumbs doesn't create a compelling world or scenario. If anything, I just think you couldn't bother coming up with your own lore, hoping I'd fill in the gaps. My only thought is whether some Crystal Gems got lost, because there's quite a few rock people here. 

One of the more disappointing “fights” for me was The First Soul, as he's the only titan that speaks with you. It gives a small glimpse as to what the character's intent might be, but not enough to clear matters up or explain what's happening, let alone why. What annoyed me about it most of all was that it felt somewhat like I was being lectured before putting down a stray dog, except I have no other recourse unless I wanted to stop playing the game. “You're such a tormented soul, but also selfish and foolish. Go ahead though, kill me. Absorbing my power is more important than the sanctity of life.” I mean, you're a sentient mountain with nobody to talk to, so I'm probably doing you a favor anyways. 

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2897602425
[h1]Visuals[/h1] 
Your view of the action in TS is from an overhead angle, and at a distance as well, which makes your character quite small on the screen. This is to accommodate the boss arenas and their large size, so you have time to respond to their attacks. I wouldn't say it's hard to keep track of your character, but being able to determine your position in relation to the weak spot and charge and line up your shot accurately isn't inherently easy. If there was any meaning or purpose behind it, the landscapes and environments would be more pleasurable to look at, because they're well made. They look serene while also having a sense of scale and grandeur about them. However, since they're open and barren, with no story-telling elements taking place, it only wastes time before you get to fight the next titan. 


[h1]Sound Design[/h1] 
This will sound odd, but although TS has some really engaging and snappy songs, it's not really much of a benefit. Each boss having a compelling tune doesn't mean much when you aren't in the fight long enough to hear the whole song. Quite a few bosses can kill you within a few seconds, and you won't hear the song again until after you've walked all the way back. If the song continued on as you respawned and started the fight over again it would work much better, giving players a chance to hear these tunes. The sounds of the titans' attacks also tends to drown out the music. 

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2897601891
[h1]Pros[/h1] 
🌟 The boss designs aren't as varied as I'd have hoped. I saw quite a few stone figures and faces after all. How you beat each of them is more distinct though, so it somewhat makes up for that. 
🌟 Conceptually, I like the idea of the player and boss being equally vulnerable. One shot will kill both. I just don't love the execution. 


[h1]Cons[/h1] 
❌ Your window of opportunity on some bosses is very small or can be made more complicated because of other factors. For instance, stunning Knight Elhanan by shooting his magic arrow isn't too hard. However, retrieving your arrow and hitting him before his armor rejuvenates means that stunning him might be a waste of your time if those other factors aren't ideal. 
❌ The intention of TS doesn't seem to be one where you engage in a battle for minutes, bobbing and weaving while waiting for your opportune moment. It's more like they were meant to be cheesed, as a few achievements show. 


[h1]Tips[/h1]
🔍 On the Yeti fight, I found that hitting him after his first wall charge was much harder than it seems because the timing is so precise. Swerve to the right and back left so he charges two more times, and he'll be much easier to hit then. 
🔍 I'd suggest watching video guides on how to beat the bosses quickly. Sometimes it's a bit obtuse how you're meant to make them vulnerable, and brute forcing the solution would be obnoxious. 


[h1]Final Thoughts[/h1] 
As someone who enjoys a good boss fight, I'd have thought a boss gauntlet like this would have appealed to me more. However, the developers made some odd choices in the design that wound up doing nothing to make TS more appealing. Creating beautiful scenery is pointless when players have no idea about the location they're in. 

Why are these titans clustered so close to one another? It makes killing them all convenient, but I've no idea what my reason for doing so is. Plus, what moron decided I needed to take a 20 second walk before retrying the boss after each death? Of course I'm going to search for the easy way to cheese your boss fights if you don't respect my time. With that in mind, I don't recommend TS.

author: {'steamid': '76561198424726058', 'num_games_owned': 66, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 103, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 103, 'last_played': 1670306306}

author: {'steamid': '76561198860033795', 'num_games_owned': 326, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 26, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 26, 'last_played': 1670192443}
review:
Сама по себе игра хорошая и я бы её с удовольствием прошёл, но мне за 15-20 смертей надоело ждать анимацию смерти/воскрешения и возвращаться из контрольной точки к боссу каждый раз тоже вымораживает в особенности, когда он тебя с первого прыжка прихлопнет.
Если кому-то не лень это ждать/делать, то игру я бы скорее порекомендовал для вас, потому что каждый босс требует отдельной тактики и убивать его интересно, тем более что достаточно одного попадания, но для себя я решил, что возврат к чекпоинту это минус, который всё портит.
И ещё не знаю отнести ли навигацию по миру к плюсу или к минусу - отсутствует карта и надо идти куда глаза глядят и там возможно найдётся то, что ты ищешь :)

review: 游戏很好，通关了两次，我是用键盘的，操作并没有太过不堪，就是有些boss要跑远一点路，浪费比较多时间，一个人一把弓一支箭，最后能将所有boss都打倒成就感还是挺不错的，最难打的应该是倒数第二个boss（我记得是）自己的影子还是啥的，箭射过去它会瞬移闪避，要连续快速射击两次（它瞬移有cd）才能打死它，总流程还是比较短的，如果觉得太难可以考虑手柄或者不买

author: {'steamid': '76561198010335843', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 276, 'playtime_forever': 18, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5, 'last_played': 1674633988}
review:
There's something very wrong with this game. A one hit death mechanic done right is something like Celeste or Super Meat Boy, which are fast-pased and get you back in the action right away as soon as you die. This game's one hit death is pointless. They COULD give you a life bar, they just choose not to to make the game arbitrarily more time-consuming. They COULD start you back at the boss as soon as you die, but they choose to make you walk back. They COULD allow you to move when you try to retrieve your knife, but they choose to make the game clunky by forcing you to stand still.

It's not that this game is just bad, it's that it's deliberately made to be a waste of time. The fun : time spent ratio in this game is very low.

author: {'steamid': '76561198332849567', 'num_games_owned': 221, 'num_reviews': 59, 'playtime_forever': 57, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 57, 'last_played': 1669603759}
review:
To me the game didn't seem like fun. I opened the first gates, but then got a boss that was a skull cube with 2 morning stars in the fire portion of the map and after several attempts I couldn't care less to try again.

The boss has to be hit into a small spot on the back and with a preset angle (with a 45 degree step), it quickly turned into a game of luck hoping that the angle I am shooting at will match the angle of the boss' rotation and possition in that moment.

Another annoying part is that running takes time, respawn animation and fading screen after death takes time. After the open gates the area i vast and I had to play hide and seek with the bosses and it just immediately started to feel like a waste of time.

You should have continued with the same design of "caves" as the starting 4 bosses and not try to complicate it by creating a world that has nothing in it but tiles of different colors.

author: {'steamid': '76561198966042978', 'num_games_owned': 68, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 433, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 282, 'last_played': 1669982332}
review: 就一个字，爽，难度还算适中吧，一周目死了326次，4.5个小时通关了，很久没有玩这种类型的游戏了，只要7.6，就能买到非常好的体验，每个boos都有一定的规律，当然有一些要靠一点运气，大部分摸清规律都蛮好打的。建议用手柄进行游玩，这个游戏键盘只有八个方向，会加大游戏难度，及其不友好。

author: {'steamid': '76561199082972745', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 325, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 193, 'last_played': 1705822238}
review:
打了三个小时终于通关了，比起那个雪人最后两个boss根本不值一提啊。
玩这个游戏还是推荐用手柄玩，用键盘只能瞄八个方向并且得忍受那奇怪的键位。顺带一提最后一个boos召唤的那些有个大嘴的眼珠可以拿弓箭射掉，要是早知道这个我至少可以少死个十几次。

author: {'steamid': '76561198259637417', 'num_games_owned': 97, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 1066, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1066, 'last_played': 1669518047}
review:
Игра в целом неплохая, если поиграть пару часиков и забыть.Но если вы решились пройти ее полностью готовьтесь бросить вызов самому сложному боссу в игре а именно управлению.  Управление в этой игре самый главный босс, из-за неудобного управления которое нельзя поменять, большинство боссов становятся очень душными, особенно это чувствуется на клавиатуре, когда нужно попасть боссу в пиксель который показывается на мгновение и  когда это мгновение настанет попасть получится с трудом!
Но те, у кого есть геймпад, ситуация хоть и легче из-за более удобного управления, но пиксель выцеливать вам придется, и если вы не пользуетесь контролером часто,  у вас уйдет много попыток на то, чтобы попасть, так-как вы будете стрелять на ощупь.   
Сложность игры как по мне 3/10 но из-за управления и стрельбы сложность возрастает в 2 раза.

author: {'steamid': '76561198353780540', 'num_games_owned': 163, 'num_reviews': 69, 'playtime_forever': 246, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 202, 'last_played': 1684001487}
review: My biggest inspiration for when I create my own video game <3.  Only patient gamers will beat this one.  It takes a lot of dedication to memorize each bosses patterns and master the simple but stretched out combat.  The music, sprite work, bosses, level design, combat design and overall game feel are just so amazing.  Dark Souls players especially will feel at home with this one, give it a try!

author: {'steamid': '76561198202899643', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 209, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 209, 'last_played': 1528634854}
review:
优点：
优美的画风+
有趣的BOOS战（实际上这点也是问题）
宏大的战斗场景++
气势磅礴的BGM++
缺点：
不平衡的游戏困难设定-
枯燥的死亡和赶路-
没有成长其他手段-（指装备丶技能丶或道具等等）
实际游戏内容只有BOOS 很单调枯燥-

不是很推荐，它虽然是高难度的游戏玩法，但实际上就是折磨你，你的射击方式操作控制 并不那么流畅，也没有什么其他的可以额外的操作技巧，你只需要知道BOOS的攻击方式就行了 所以实际体验很差 。
你只有上下左右控制，以及射击拉收弓箭。（射出去的弓箭再回收回来 真的是折磨设定！！）

author: {'steamid': '76561198021078112', 'num_games_owned': 922, 'num_reviews': 184, 'playtime_forever': 355, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 355, 'last_played': 1669276239}
review:
Маленький шедеврик. Не обращайте внимания на слово "души" в названии - оно здесь чисто для привлечения аудитории на фоне популярности серии. Главный источник вдохновения тут - Shadow of the Colossus. Судите сами: есть мальчуган, у которого есть только лук и одна стрела, по желанию возвращающаяся в руку, есть пустоватый мир, в котором из врагов только боссы с именами на неведомом языке, некоторые из которых к тому же выглядят как каменные изваяния с характерной резьбой. Герой умирает с одного тычка, но и боссам тоже достаточно одной стрелы, правда не куда угодно, а в индивидуальное слабое место.

На этом и строится весь нехитрый, но в тоже время хитрый геймплей. Ничем не испорченные битвы с боссами, где ты сначала ничего не понимаешь, пытаешься хотя бы не умереть, потом обнаруживаешь ахиллесову пяту, догадываешься когда враг открывается, и вот в решающий момент делаешь выстрел и наслаждаешься победой. Также, к некоторым боссам ещё и сам вход искать надо. Игра быстро пробегается, но открывается хард, где боссы ускоряются и качественно усиляются. Там уже можно поругаться на некоторую рандомность в боях, слишком уж иногда мелкие промежутки времени для выстрела дают, но опять же, это опциональный режим для тех, кто не наигрался.

В итоге тут ничего лишнего, оригинальный честный геймплей и непыльная отсылка на шедевральных колоссов. Идеальное сочетания, как по мне.

author: {'steamid': '76561198276627179', 'num_games_owned': 341, 'num_reviews': 33, 'playtime_forever': 101, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 101, 'last_played': 1610050478}

author: {'steamid': '76561199227382219', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 242, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 205, 'last_played': 1671557929}
review:
o jogo é muito legal, simples (só as setas do teclado + "c" que atira e pega a flecha e o "x" que da o rolamento/dash. Além disso, ele é desafiador para quem não é acostumado com esse estilo de jogo, é divertido lutar com APENAS uma flecha contra diversos titans e quando você absorve a alma deles não ganha nenhum buff  kkkkkkkk. Fiquei triste pelo aumento de preço causado pela steam (2,49 para 4,69 do jogo base e 3,49 para 5,99 na special edition durante promoções). Mas vale o seu preço mesmo assim, pode confiar.
Meu ponto negativo é que não sei o local de cada boss, logo fico andando por ai que nem desorientado kkkkk.

author: {'steamid': '76561198283556137', 'num_games_owned': 67, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 373, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 120, 'last_played': 1695995037}
review:
without some sort of direct lore, the game play was quite intuitive. fighting bosses with different strategies required for each makes one look forward to the next; as such i couldn't leave until i beat titan souls. as per its price, waiting for half price or on the often off-chance of its 90% off sales would be advised to save a few bucks; as the game-play for me was 2 hours on first completion without prior knowledge of the games' mechanics.

i personally didn't get heated towards this game, as each boss and learning its attack patterns took all my preoccupation.
play time is short, so wouldn't drop a $20.

ill see you on the finish line.

author: {'steamid': '76561198019647868', 'num_games_owned': 619, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 876, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 609, 'last_played': 1669516899}
review:
Fun..ish? Bosses are good, music and art is all nice, gameplay is largely fine. It took me less than 4 hours to get the true ending on my first run, which isn't great for a $15 game. Most of the time is spent running back and forth between different areas, and back to where the boss is after dying. It takes about 7 seconds just to respawn on top of that. It's bearable for one playthrough, but then there's modifiers on top of that. They make the game harder in various ways, and as a result just make the aforementioned issues much more apparent.

Normally if a game has a deathless achievement I'd do it legit, having completed Hollow Knight steel soul runs with over 100% completion twice, or going for golden strawberries in Celeste, but at this point I'm just going to savescum the last few achievements so I don't have to run around for 10 minutes each attempt, and forget about this game forever. Not worth the $15 imo, only get it on sale or if they make it free again.

author: {'steamid': '76561198202141575', 'num_games_owned': 2593, 'num_reviews': 307, 'playtime_forever': 183, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 183, 'last_played': 1668804559}
review:
you better know what you are getting into . 
but i do recommend this , IF
1. you enjoy really difficult games 
2. you don't mind some fights and mechanics being really annoying
3. you are just looking for bossfights ; there is no story or lore to speak of
4. know and accept that it will feel like you are just running from the checkpoint to battles half the time ; there is a fair bit of downtime
5. you have a controller or are okay with the game being a bit clumsy on keyboard 

it is a well made boss-crawler , not amazing or anything , but if you know it is what you are looking for , go for it

author: {'steamid': '76561198255553511', 'num_games_owned': 540, 'num_reviews': 93, 'playtime_forever': 461, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 437, 'last_played': 1669305243}
review:
[h1]Всё гениальное просто![/h1]
[b]ㅤХардкорная пиксельная игрушка, ощущается как внебрачное дитя Dark Souls и Shadow of the Colossus. От соулса, как мне показалось, взяли хардкорность и фирменное заучиваение движений боссов, выведение уникальных для каждого тактик боя, а от Колосса общую стилистику (ыыыы и там бальшие сущиства и здесь ыыы). В целом игра, если игнорировать всю жопную боль, что она приносит, очень хороша. После убийства титанов ощущается даже некое чувство печали. Провожу в этом смысле маленькую параллель с Хотлайн Маямой (поскольку издатель один и тот же, а также нахожу сходство в принципе "1 удар - 1 смерть"), когда, зачистив весь уровень, ты ощущаешь опустошение, грусть и ей подобные эмоции. 
ㅤСопровождающая нас на нелегком пути музыка просто великолепна, парочка OST'ов с битв отправилась в плейлист :) Про визуал и говорить нет смысла, у разработчиков, несмотря на общий минималистичный, получилось создать великолепные арты и спрайты, радуется глаз! Также стоит отметить, что вопреки крайне лёгкому управлению – всего две кнопки– произведение является безумно хардкорным за счет выше перечисленных причин.
ㅤОднозначно стоит брать, незабываемый опыт, особенно, если вы любите игры с высокой сложностью, где нужно доказывать своё мастерство.[/b]

author: {'steamid': '76561198069369321', 'num_games_owned': 718, 'num_reviews': 70, 'playtime_forever': 34, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 34, 'last_played': 1668555163}
review: The idea is good, but the game really needs to refine its mechanics. The movement is just a little too clunky and I wish restarting a fight was as quick as dying in one was. The fading screen transitions and the walk towards the boss room get grating really fast.

author: {'steamid': '76561198166351331', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 212, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 212, 'last_played': 1668509356}
review:
Мне правда хотелось пройти местный хард мод, но чувствую, что не вынесу настолько убогого управления на клавиатуре. Здесь не используется мышь, и хотя Titan Souls очень требовательна к скорости и точности реакции, целиться вы можете только стрелками - то бишь на восемь направлений. Можно, конечно, воспринимать это как дополнительный челлендж, но мне не очень нравится, когда сложность в игре основывается на неудобстве; серьёзно, всю игру было ощущение, будто меня заставляют играть на гитаре в варежках. Сложно ли было сделать всё по-человечески? Не знаю, но итог на мой взгляд достоин порицания.
А ведь игра правда неплоха: эдакий оммаж Shadow of the Colossus, полностью построенный на битвах с боссами, где в равной степени исход решают ваши навыки и смекалка. Неплоха, но если не являетесь счастливым обладателем геймпада, покупать крайне не советую, иначе рискуете поджечь то, на чём сидите.

author: {'steamid': '76561198020871824', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 7, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7, 'last_played': 1668510056}
review:
Gros bug dès le départ, l’écran n’est centré QU’en 800x600...en 2022 sur un moniteur 4k c’est minable.

En plus je n’en peux plus des graphisme style 8bits. C’est tout simplement moche. En fait non, c’est horrible.
Il faut vraiment NE PAS avoir connu l’époque 8 bits pour en avoir la nostalgie…

Pas de règles, pas d’histoire, on ne sait pas quoi faire du coup on ne trouve aucun intérêt au jeu.
Si on vous l’offre prenez le (ça vous fera manger de la bande passante).
Sinon, même a 1 euro c’est trop cher...

author: {'steamid': '76561198076678939', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 12, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 12, 'last_played': 1668476553}
review: Fantastic visuals, but believe it or not, getting insta-killed by a single mistake isn't fun. If the resets were as fast as Celeste, I could have fun, but because you have to manually run for several seconds to get back into the bossroom before you can start the challenge over again, it gets frustrating really quickly. 10 seconds doesn't seem that long, but when you have it so that one mistake instakills you, minimizing frustration should be a priority.

author: {'steamid': '76561199125496141', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 18, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 18, 'last_played': 1668457733}
review:
Das Spielprinzip ist wirklich sehr gut und die Boss kämpfe sind bestimmt (weil ich noch nicht viel gespielt hab) sehr anspruchsvoll.
Leider kann man das Spiel mit der Tastatur kaum spielen und die Steuerung auch nicht um belegen. Mann kann das Spiel jedoch mit einem Controller spielen, was das Ganze deutlich angenehmer macht.
Wenn man einen Controller hat sollte man sich dieses Spiel im Angebot mal anschauen.
Falls man bei Getting over it schon mentale Probleme bekommen hat würde ich dieses Spiel jedoch nicht empfehlen.

review:
Such an underrated masterpiece. The game is short but it's fun. I think it's similar to Elden Ring, you are free to choose which boss you want to destroy first. It's light, challenging, and you need to think creatively for each boss fight. Playing it in hard mode would give a brand new experience. The music score for each region fits the mood perfectly. Boss fight soundtrack totally slaps. Definitely worth the price. 

Remember,  the special trait of this game is that you only have one ammunition - one arrow, so make sure to only release it when it counts! 9/10

I would not recommend this game to people with slow reflexes and who doesn't like the thrill of adrenaline, this game is for people who enjoys looking for ways to kill the boss while evading dozens of projectiles and the bosses trying to stomp, roll, crush, slice, incinerate your tiny character. but if you are a masochist psycho then this game is for you.

review: It's a delightful little game, and feels incredibly rewarding to beat. All bosses are designed to be one-shotted, and each battle can be over in seconds. Conversely, you can be killed in one shot. The game takes a tiny bit of patience and observing skills, and then you'll topple the titans one at a time. The surprise secret boss was a real treat and I loved its inspirations. So glad I gave this game a fair try.

author: {'steamid': '76561198007888370', 'num_games_owned': 612, 'num_reviews': 571, 'playtime_forever': 4055, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4055, 'last_played': 1624156490}
review:
Titan Souls is pretty much a kind of pixilated Dark Souls.

One of the most challenging pixel games I’ve ever played, with a phenomenal visual concept. One of the few games I’ve played, that I ended up loving, but will never play again.

As neckbeardy as it may sound, playing Titan Souls made me feel like a matador.

After getting my butt kicked multiple times, I had to reassess how I was playing the game. After a while things started to click, and it became a really satisfying and calming combat experience.

Still, the brutal difficulty is balanced by the immediacy with which you are given a chance to learn from your mistakes, and this game doesn’t understand that concept at all due to the run back mechanic. 

It’s Zelda 2 levels of archaic. After beating it I decided I’ll never touch this game again due to how much this game wastes your time.

It’s still worth checking out at least once, specially when it goes for sale for super cheap. Good game for ruining your life if you suffer form anger management. At least it’s cheaper than cocaine.

6/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198073332036', 'num_games_owned': 413, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 154, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 154, 'last_played': 1667787245}
review:
In this nicely presented yet barren world where 3d and 2d blend seamlessly to create, sadly, such a [b]boring[/b] game. It's a boss rush game and you spend most of your time running back to the boss room. I have so far played about 2 hours and 40 minute and in that time I killed 8 bosses for I'd say total of 25 minutes of actual fight. Rest was mindlesly running from spawn to room ad nauseam. [i]To devs; If your only punishment for death is tedium, perhaps consider better rewards than the relief of being done with a particular boss just so you don't have to walk the same path for the umpteenth time.[/i] 

+Unique boss designs. Figuring out how to stay alive long enough to find that one very short window of opportunity to beat a boss was enjoyable.
+Art is pretty to look at, though bit bland in some parts.
+Controller rumbles are beautifully utilized.

-No other weapons, which would be fine had the only weapon in the game felt satisfying to use. There is no indicator for where you're aiming other than the tiniest of gray triangle at the tip of your arrow.
-No visual progression either. 
-No cutscenes or story bites. (other than the animation that plays when you defeat a boss which I admit is quite satisfying for the first few times.)
-Absolutely horriblly implemented dodge roll and sprint mechanic. Movement in general feels clunky and unsatisfying. You can't sprint without rolling first, heck most of the time you're not even sure if you're sprinting because there is literally no sprite change to your character. I shouldn't have to ask "am I still sprinting?" in the middle of chaos.

author: {'steamid': '76561198147741007', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 388, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 217, 'last_played': 1667806402}
review:
I paid around $3.50 and still feel like a waste of money. If you tell me this is a project for a portfolio... its nice... Beautiful Pixel Art and Music; But gameplay is boring and tedious.

-Literally just 1 arrow, thats all.
-The dash is not precise... the whole control is not precise...
-The map is beautiful... BUT ITS EMPY.
-Checkpoints are so far from the Titans that each time you die (and you die a lot), you need to walk all over again to the titan's cave... Literally 70% of gameplay is walking over and over for the same place because you die.
-There is no pause...
-No map or indication where are the rest of titans. Exloration as excuse? well... its it wasn't an empty and boring world... would be a nice idea.

author: {'steamid': '76561198053053672', 'num_games_owned': 808, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 93, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 93, 'last_played': 1647743939}
review: I personally don't actually like the game much, but respect it. It's well made but I can't deal with the downtime commute between retries and fights. Where I can deal with Dark Souls bc of the time to kill and flexibility of approach or Hotline Miami bc of how fast it is to die but almost faster to jump right back, Titan Souls lets the time between your revival and reattempt REALLY sink in. Again, it's well made, the atmosphere, controls, and fights are nice, but it's an inverse of what I prefer.

author: {'steamid': '76561197998455758', 'num_games_owned': 1566, 'num_reviews': 1960, 'playtime_forever': 34, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 34, 'last_played': 1460817216}
review:
Great idea. But everything is spoiled by a terrible implementation. The character control is rather clumsy, there are few game mechanics, and the mechanics themselves are rather boring.

Also, there is very little content. Combined with the fact that you have to die over and over again, in the same places, this makes the game disgusting.

author: {'steamid': '76561198001025729', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 144, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 144, 'last_played': 1666903969}
review:
Good premise and idea, dogshit execution. The game somehow manages to have only 3 game mechanics (Dodge, shoot and retrieve) and none of them feel remotely polished. You will constantly fight against the game's jank instead of making use of the game mechanics. Hard pass.

Also the hitboxes are so bad you'd almost think this was a Capcom game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198165954755', 'num_games_owned': 176, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 242, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 242, 'last_played': 1666900630}
review:
No momento em que escrevo essa análise eu acabei de finalizar o jogo. Esse jogo é o padrão decorar movimentos e saber quando atacar, você vai morrer muitas vezes para um chefe só e quase nenhuma para outro, eu mesmo morri 250 vezes pra conseguir terminar.

A arte desse jogo é incrível, bem simples porém com muitos detalhes. 
Outra coisa que tenho que pontuar é a trilha sonora do jogo, ela fez a experiencia ser muito mais completa em todos os sentidos, jogue escutando a própria trilha sonora do jogo que faz muita diferença.

Se você quer um jogo desafiador e bom ao mesmo tempo, mas que não é extremamente grande te obrigando a jogar durante varias horas para terminar, esse é o jogo. Recomendo muito.

author: {'steamid': '76561199089640258', 'num_games_owned': 193, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 481, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 481, 'last_played': 1666508205}
review:
[h1]SOULS ДЛЯ маленьких[/h1]

Как и многие, взял игру на бесплатной раздаче и забил на неё благополучно х*й... Недавно решил пройти игры из моей библиотеки и глаз пал на [u]Titan Souls[/u], так что я решил всё-таки поиграть в неё.

[b]• Сюжет[/b]
Я его не нашёл(( Ну тут есть как бы отголоски сюжета, но... эээээ... короче х*ета.

[b]• Геймлей[/b]
Основная задача данной игры, ходить по локациям и побеждать боссов и собирать их души. У нас есть перекат и стрела...всё, этим мы должны побеждать титанов. Перекат раздражает, постоянно врезаешься в стены и лестницы, и отлетаешь от них.

[b]• Титаны[/b]
Сами титаны получились довольно разнообразными. Что бы их победить, нужно найти их слабое место, зафигарить туда стрелой и забрать их душу. Кстати, хотя вся игра исполнена в 2D, но боссы сделаны в 3D, что выглядит неплохо.

[b]• Локации[/b]
После прохождения первых четырёх боссов мы попадаем на супер огромную местность, по которой очень бл*дь сложно ориентироваться. Надо будет находить остальных титанов на кладбищах, в заснеженной местности, в лавовых пещерах и т.д.

[b]• Музыка[/b]
Ну музыкальное сопровождение дефолтное, никаких запоминающихся треков нет, ну разве может быть в лавовой пещере у боссов имеются прикольные саундтреки.

[b]Оценка: 5/10[/b]

author: {'steamid': '76561198146312022', 'num_games_owned': 234, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 29, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 29, 'last_played': 1666410258}
review:
免费领了以后心血来潮想玩一下。
键盘死半天打不死人，换手柄十分钟过了三个boss。
这个游戏的操作性有点稀烂，难就在于瞄准，操作主角的时候会感觉很笨重，非常不舒服。
一般来说高难度游戏过关以后应该给人成就感，但是这个游戏打过boss以后只会让我觉得很傻逼，完全感觉不到正反馈。
你可以硬核，但是你不好玩那不就没意思了么。

author: {'steamid': '76561198977759170', 'num_games_owned': 90, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 16325, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 16325, 'last_played': 1643463370}
review: 很公平，BOSS和你都是一下死，但是BOSS擦一下你就得死，你要打中BOSS的弱点，如果没有这个辣鸡瞄准系统的话，这个游戏没有那么难

author: {'steamid': '76561198033623422', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 132, 'playtime_forever': 46, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 46, 'last_played': 1666353797}
review:
Not for me.

This game condenses all the frustration of dying over and over in boss fights down into a minimal viable game. 

Most of the game value seems to be doing the same content over and over again but at harder difficulties, and I just struggle to be motivated to meet that challenge when there are so many more rewarding games out there.

author: {'steamid': '76561198848794902', 'num_games_owned': 78, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 462, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 456, 'last_played': 1688452895}
review:
我这游戏是他之前免费的时候领的。
我给这款游戏推荐，也很大程度是因为它是一款免费的游戏。下面开始讲讲这游戏到底是怎么样的。

在这款游戏里，你可以感受到它有特别特别优秀的音乐（尤其是BOSS战的音乐），优秀的场景设计（特指场景好看），浓厚的神秘感和史诗感，迷你的主角和BOSS也形成鲜明的对比，所以BOSS战很有压迫感。制作组甚至自创了一种游戏的专有符号文字，可以看出制作组还是算挺用心的。
游戏很难，BOSS摸你一下就死（但是你打到BOSS弱点一下BOSS也会死），也正因为它的难度，每打赢一个BOSS你都会很有成就感。

但是！！！！！！
我不推荐大家去打这款游戏（特别是没有手柄的！！），除非是非常非常有耐心的人（抖M除外）

纵使它有这样那样的优点，它作为一款游戏，它真的很难让人有兴致玩下去。

首先第一大关，打完稍微简单一点的史莱姆后，很多玩家就没有兴致再玩下去了。为什么？
因为还剩下的三个BOSS对于新手来说实在太太太太难了，如果不是评论区说主角打到BOSS弱点一下就算赢，我都根本不知道是这样的规则而早早就弃游了！
接下来的BOSS依旧很难，可以说，任何一个BOSS，你不找攻略，都是难打的。
就算你打完了BOSS，你除了能感受到成就感，你游戏中的人物依然是没有任何！一丝！提升的，也就是说你的努力和回报似乎不成正比，这对激起玩家继续游玩的兴趣是不利的。

最最要命的就是这个游戏的战斗系统！！！

主角的攻击打起来可以说是巨巨巨难受，一般来说BOSS的攻击手段都是比较单一的，多打几次都已经会打了，但是在BOSS漏出破绽的那可怜的一瞬间！它这个蛋疼的射击，十有八九都是射不中你想射的地方的（而且键盘玩家只有8个射击方向），特别在我打最终BOSS的时候感受尤为明显，这是特别让人愤怒和无奈的！

对于一般玩家来说（就算你看了攻略），要打赢BOOS，5成看熟练度，5成看运气！

顺便一提，我个人认为地图的设计并不是很好，对于不熟悉地图的玩家很容易迷路，甚至让人有点迷。
然后剧情方面还是比较有内涵的，游玩下来感觉很明显制作组想表达一篇神秘的史诗，但是在你不看相关解析的情况下，你完全不明白这游戏讲的是什么剧情。。


最后的最后，别的不说，这游戏的音乐是真的很棒！！！！

author: {'steamid': '76561197968634862', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 265, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 265, 'last_played': 1666013408}
review:
I really love the concept of this game, many bosses with unique fight and a way to kill, and u have to discover how to beat him.

Well. the problem here is this is very easy game, u need like 2-5 try just to figure out how to beat the boss, and u'll not spend more than 2-10 min "in maximum" to kill a boss, and that's mean u gonna beat the game in just 2-3h like i did.

2- Severe Lack Of Content: to reach each boss the only thing u have to do is just walking to, i wish like there's a puzzle to solve before you can enter to fight the boss.

Yes i enjoy it, but still cant recommended with this price. not worth. 4.99$ would be fair, not more.

author: {'steamid': '76561198417829012', 'num_games_owned': 213, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 2225, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 502, 'last_played': 1696346511}
review:
首先，这款游戏[b] 只推荐用手柄 [/b]玩，因为用键盘进行弓箭瞄准的时候只有八向而且不支持鼠标瞄准，非常坐牢，而手柄则可以用摇杆全方向瞄准。
如果你有手柄并且也像我一样非常喜欢魂类和像素风的话，那么十分推荐这款游戏：清新怡人的像素场景、恰到好处的BGM、魂类的难度-快感平衡曲线结合敌我双方的一击必杀机制，让这款游戏既难又上瘾，令人欲罢不能。

author: {'steamid': '76561198026079687', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 105, 'playtime_forever': 216, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 216, 'last_played': 1632677059}
review:
Estuvo gratis en Steam y me enganchó hasta que me lo pasé. El juego sería una versión en pixel art e isométrica de Shadow of the Colossus pero con una mecánica curiosa, ya que la única arma que podemos usar es un arco con una sola flecha la cual podemos atraer una vez lanzada, y además tiene mecánicas one hit tanto para el jugador como para los enemigos (que solo son titanes, sin haber minions ni cosas parecidas). 

Aunque todos los enemigos tienen un punto débil la verdad es que el juego te exige en algunas ocasiones de una rapidez de reflejos y puntería que añaden dificultad de forma artificial (para 13 titanes morí más de 200 veces, y eso que no había que derrotar a todos para completar el juego). 

El apartado artístico tanto visual como sonoro me parecieron de 10 y la historia, como todo juego tipo "souls" (que de souls solo tiene los jefes y la dificultad) que se precie, es enrevesada y está escrita entre líneas. Según vi en internet, el final del juego se me bugueó y no pude luchar contra el jefe secreto del final, pero tampoco me voy a complicar la vida con eso.

author: {'steamid': '76561198010037753', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 14, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 14, 'last_played': 1663959299}
review:
The basic idea is fine, the problem is that the game loves to waste your time.

Most fights are over very, very quickly, either because you killed the boss or (more often), the boss killed you. You're gonna die a lot.

That's not inherently a bad thing, but when you die, you get sent back to a checkpoint that is probably 10-30 seconds away from starting the fight again. So you end up spending somewhere between a third and half of your playtime running back to the boss. It gets old really, REALLY fast.

author: {'steamid': '76561198113388537', 'num_games_owned': 4356, 'num_reviews': 128, 'playtime_forever': 290, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 290, 'last_played': 1663513698}
review:
[h1] One hit is all I need [/h1]

Titan Souls is a well crafted Boss Rush Game which offers a unique twist. Both you and the Boss are one hit away from dying. And all you got is a bow with one arrow. Well to be honest some bosses require more than one hit to kill, since they hide or protect there weak spot. But none the less everything dies from just one hit. 
So you find yourself walking are world in between worlds made by one protect by many. All you need to do is walk the path and kill all titans. The overworld offers nothing but walking, which can be annoying. Sometimes you end up dying in a fight and you have to walk from the Checkpoint that is a little further away. If you died like the 10th time at the same boss and you have to walk the same path the 10th times, I presume i dont have to tell you how annoying that could be. 
I tell you this first because this is what felt bad. It is one of two things i dont like about the game. The second being the worst game decison of all time. So Imagine when walking the 10th time all the way to the titan that you seemingly cant kill. And you can roll which allows you to not only dodge but to move quicker. After rolling you end up in a sprint. The worst enemy of rolling are stairs. You cant roll upstairs. Sounds stupid. And yeah in real life rolling upstairs is not a usual way of moving on stairs, but here you bounce off back were you came from. No tie things together. You died another time, maybe a mistake you did. You know next time it will be the death of the titan. You have it on your fingers, you know exacatly what to do. And you spawn, you want get to the titan as fast as possible. An you press rolling. And well the is a stairs. Because you climb a mountain and a tower and everything is elevated. And you bounce back, back to the checkpoint. I got pissed several times. Hate it.

Gladly this is the only thing i hated. Other then that it is a great game. Each titan offers a unique challenge. A different fighting style forcing you to adapt and overcome him, in order to get the killing blow. The visuals are stunning. And I have been blown away by some animations. The music does its job pretty well. Some fights have forgetable music others have incredible music. Most memorable for me the final fight against the Soul and the Titan Slayer. If you dive deeper into the story, which is not obviously told, you find a unique perspective rarly seen. Even so one of my favorite animes has it. It is worth to slay all titans. And to slay a titan is an incredible feeling. The moment the arrow hits and everything stops and you are only left by silence judging you and what you did. Except for the times when the arrow is stuck between the butt cheeks of a yet or in the crotch of a knight. Not that plesant. 

For me this games comes with the one thing i love. Storytelling. Its not obvious and it leaves room for interpretation. But discovery is rare and rewarded. The Game Loop works. It takes it Artstyl into count. Using it to make an incredible experience rounded by a Soundtrack that has memorable tracks. 
So for me? I move over to Deaths Door another game made by the same developer. Which somewhat or somehow plays in the same world.

author: {'steamid': '76561198364581592', 'num_games_owned': 233, 'num_reviews': 50, 'playtime_forever': 48, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 48, 'last_played': 1663514201}
review:
死亡之門的前作，
遊戲機制相當不成熟。

雙方只有一滴血的設計，
聽起來很創新對吧，
但畢竟不能讓你簡單通關，
破綻幾乎不能有，
因此99.9%的時間就是用那殘破的機體移動，
在正確的時機攻擊就贏了。
這也導致與boss的交互性極低，
每過一關也不會有什麼成就感。
又抱歉這作只有boss，
也不會有任何探索樂趣。

這種遊戲相當注重玩家與怪物的你來我往，
這也就是為何類魂遊戲沒幾款設計成這樣。

如果玩過這款再去玩死亡之門，
可能能從一些地方看到驚喜，
不過也僅是如此。
也只能慶幸是玩完死亡之門再回來玩這款了……

author: {'steamid': '76561198028131013', 'num_games_owned': 392, 'num_reviews': 129, 'playtime_forever': 71, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 71, 'last_played': 1663478371}
review:
死にゲーだ。
ボス戦特化でJOTUNと似てる。
何度も何度も死ぬ。
しかも弓矢の一撃で、自分もボスも死んだりする。
シビアな戦いだ。
俺は嫌いじゃない。
でもな、何がストレスって、死んだ後のリスタート位置。
近くにチェックポイントはあるけども、そんなに近くもないし、ただでさ移動が遅いのに、何十回って死ぬのに、そんなにいちいち歩いていられない。
ボス部屋でリスタートでいいじゃんね。
死ぬことよりも移動にイライラするゲーム。
オススメしない。

author: {'steamid': '76561198183301285', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 1075, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1052, 'last_played': 1663582519}
review:
- 굵고 짧은 보스전
이 게임은 플레이어와 보스, 둘 다 죽창을 들고 서로에게 한대만을 시전한다. 플레이어에게 한대 맞으면 죽는다는 건 노히트 챌린지에 불과하지만, 그냥 보스가 한 대 맞고 죽으면 이딴게 게임인가 싶을 것이다. 그렇기에 이 게임의 보스는 그 단 한 대를 맞지 않기 위해 보호막을 만들거나 혹은 공격할 틈이 없을 만큼 빠른 공격을 하는 등 온갖 수단을 동원한다.
딜을 누적시키는 방식이 아니다 보니 보스전은 자연스레 다크소울같은 전투 보스전보단 기믹 보스전에 가까워졌다. 기믹 보스전은 장치에 대한 이해가 필수이기에 공략을 알면 너무 쉽고, 모르면 아예 진행 자체가 막혀 정교한 레벨디자인이 필요하다. 그래서 일반적으로 기믹 보스전은 이벤트용으로 쓰는 까다로운 물건이다.
하지만 Acid Nerve는 기믹 보스전을 지향하되 전투 보스전의 컨트롤 요소를 일부 채택하여 이 문제를 해결하려 시도하였고 그 시도는 성공적이였다. 매번 보스를 만날 때 마다 장치를 찾아야 하는 피로감은 장치에 대한 열쇠, 약점에 대한 정보를 직관적으로 제공하여 없앴고, 대신 그 만큼 쉬워진 게임은 약점에 도달하기 어렵게 공격 패턴을 추가하여 플레이어에게 컨트롤을 요구함으로써 해결하였다.

- 일부 보스의 운빨
하지만 이 방식에도 한 가지 결점이 있는데, 바로 보스의 패턴 운빨을 많이 받게 되었다는거다. 정확히는 랜덤적인 움직임이 문제다. 보스들은 기본적으로 정해진 루틴을 반복하고, 특정한 조건이 만족되었을 때 특별한 패턴을 사용하도록 한다. 하지만 이건 무엇을 쓸 지 결정하지, 어떻게 쓸 지는 랜덤인 경우가 많다. Mol-Qayin이 용암 분사, Rol-Qayin의 눈 위치,  Stratus의 서리 광선 방향,  Obello의 머리 방향, Avarice의 동전, Knight Elhanan의 화살과 The Soul의 워프는 순전히 랜덤이다. 특히, 랜덤 패턴이 보스의 약점에 직접접인 영향을 줄 경우 순전히 운이 나빠 계속 기다려야 하는 일이 생긴다. 이런 보스의 경우 깨도, 패턴이 좋게 나와 깼다는 찝찝함이 남는다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198034162076', 'num_games_owned': 176, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 457, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 457, 'last_played': 1663077574}
review:
全体としてはやりがいのある良いゲームだと思います。

自分も敵も一撃で終わる、という特性上、あらゆるタイミングがシビアで「とりあえず避け続けてチャンスを待つ」ことが難しく、「最速パターンでの討伐ができる/できない」という運ゲーじみた展開になりがちです。

緻密な操作ができる方は別ですが、一般的なプレイヤースキルだと、アクションというよりはシビアなリアルタイムパズルといったほうが感覚的には近いでしょう。

author: {'steamid': '76561197994302237', 'num_games_owned': 545, 'num_reviews': 101, 'playtime_forever': 200, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 200, 'last_played': 1663073560}
review:
[h1]1 удар - 1 труп[/h1]

Вот лук и одна стрела - я тебе их дам, вот жизни - я их тебе не дам. Наша задача перебить разных боссов собрать с них души и спасти свою, наверно. Игра ничего не объясняет и не рассказывает, нас просто выбрасывают на локацию и мы начинаем наше приключение по захвату душ... 

Стержень игры - боссы. Они здесь во главе стола, их много, они разные, но задача одна, найти их слабое место и засадить стрелой, умирают они с одного попадания. На этом и строится вся возня с ними, надо понять где у них "Ахиллесова пята" и как к ней подлезть...

Больше о игре нечего сказать, у неё нет бэкграунда и лора, нет ничего, что может мотивировать траить боссов, игра ради игры, приятная, но не более.

author: {'steamid': '76561198299569581', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 81, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 81, 'last_played': 1623871126}
review:
Gra z typu tych trudnych, nawet bardzo trudnych. Wchodzisz na arenki, walczysz z bossami i jeśli ich pokonasz to przechodzisz dalej. Dla mnie gra zbyt trudna, ale jest do przejścia bo koledze udalo sie to zrobić. I tak od siebie to polecam grać na padzie, nie klawiaturze. Poza tym gra wedlug mnie jest świetnie wykonana, lecz jestem na Nią za słaby. Polecam! I polecam zażywać leki na nerwy przed.

A game of the difficult, even very difficult type. You enter arenas, fight bosses and if you defeat them, you move on. For me the game is too difficult, but it is manageable because my friend managed to do it. I recommend playing the pad, not the keyboard, anyway. Besides, the game is great in my opinion, but I'm too weak for it. I recommend! And I recommend taking nerve medication before.

author: {'steamid': '76561198287999349', 'num_games_owned': 401, 'num_reviews': 59, 'playtime_forever': 121, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 121, 'last_played': 1662927007}
review:
[h1] RESUMO: [/h1] 

Um jogo do estilo "Soulslike" em 2D, onde o protagonista mata Bosses por motivos desconhecidos.

[h1] GRÁFICOS/ESTÉTICA: [/h1] 

O jogo é colorido, com bom ambiente e até tem alguma variedade de biomas, mas é um mapa muito grande que ficou completamente vazio, com escadas que levam a sítios sem absolutamente nada. Os criadores tentaram fazer um jogo "grande" mas faltou inspiração e criatividade para acrescentar detalhamento ao mapa.

[h1] GAMEPLAY: [/h1] 

A gameplay é super simples com basicamente 2 controlos. O jogo baseia-se num menino com um arco e flecha que tem que matar Bosses para progredir no mapa. Para deixar o jogo difícil, o menino só tem 1 flecha que consegue disparar e apanhar de volta para efetuar o próximo disparo. Também temos somente 1 vida, ou 1 de HP, ou seja, cada golpe que sofremos é mortal e faz-nos ter que recomeçar a batalha. Os criadores do jogo acharam super divertido fazer com que cada vez que morremos, temos que fazer meia maratona e correr meio mapa para voltar a repetir a batalha o que é completamente sem sentido e estúpido. E o pior é que temos que fazer isto com 19 bosses, ou seja, repetitivo e frustrante. Para além disso, não existe qualquer tipo de progressão no jogo, acabamos o jogo basicamente como começamos. 

[h1] EXPLORAÇÃO: [/h1] 

Não existe qualquer tipo de exploração, apesar de ter um mapa gigante que falha por ser completamente vazio.

[h1] HISTÓRIA/NARRATIVA: [/h1] 

Negativamente, o jogo não possui história nenhuma. É um jogo em que um simples menino com um arco e flecha, mata monstros porque lhe apetece.

[h1] MULTIPLAYER: [/h1] 

O jogo é estritamente Singleplayer.

[h1] PREÇO: [/h1] 

O jogo foi oferecido gratuitamente pela Steam, mas honestamente é o tipo de jogo que se eu soubesse que era assim não tinha jogado nem que me pagassem. É escusado dizer que 14,99€ por isto, é o maior roubo da história.

[h1] NOTA FINAL: 2/10 [/h1]
